code: import React from'react';import{Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'./Home.css';/* Home Component */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Home=function Home(){var navigate=useNavigate();/* define hook to navigate to other pages */ /* function that navigate to the logIn page */var handleClickLogIn=function handleClickLogIn(){navigate('/logIn');};/* function that navigate to the signUp page */var handleClickSignUp=function handleClickSignUp(){navigate('/signUp');};/* function that navigate to the aboutUs page */var handleClickAboutUs=function handleClickAboutUs(){navigate('/aboutUs');};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"Home",className:"backgroundimg",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"row d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-center text-lg main-title",children:"Welcome to Car Service Information"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-md",onClick:handleClickAboutUs,children:"About Us"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-md",onClick:handleClickLogIn,children:"Log In"})," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-md",onClick:handleClickSignUp,children:"Sign Up"})," "]})]})})});};export default Home;
